MeshNumber = | Code = | }} 'CFU-GM' (or "GMP", for "granulocyte-macrophage
progenitor") is a colony forming unit. It is derived from CFU-GEMM.

The "GM" stands for "granulocyte, monocyte". 

It is the precursor for monoblasts and myeloblasts.

Production is stimulated by granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating
factor (GM-CSF).
